original_text: We know what is right. We must continue to speak about these things. We must tell people about the things that we have seen and heard.’
korean_text: 우리는 보고 들은 것을 말하지 아니할 수 없다 하니

sentences.original_text: We must continue to speak about these things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이런 것들을 계속 말해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: We must tell people about the things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 사람들에게 그것들에 대해 알려야 합니다
